Class MovieSystemManager

java.lang.Object
  edu.csupomona.cs.cs241.proj1.MovieSystemManager

public class MovieSystemManager
extends java.lang.Object

This class is the top level of abstraction for the edu.csupomona.cs.cs241.proj1 package. it contains all methods end users will need.

Author:
Satshabad

Constructor Detail

MovieSystemManager

public MovieSystemManager()
                   throws java.io.IOException,
                          java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
This creates an instance of this class which will manage all end user functionality.

Throws:
java.io.IOException - if the saved files from a previous run are not available or corrupted
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the saved files from a previous run are not available or corrupted

This adds a movie to the queue movies the user is waiting for.

Parameters:
m - the Movie to be added
priority - the priority to add the movie at in the queue

exit

public boolean exit(int n)
This method is called on closing the program and attempts to save the movie queue.

Parameters:
n - 0 if user wants to exit or return a boolean if file save failed, 1 if the user wants to exit unconditionally
Returns:
true if the files saved or false if they did not. will never return true.

searchByTitle

public Movie[] searchByTitle(java.lang.String target)
This method searches through the movie list by title attribute and returns all matches to a given target String. Partial matches are found.

Parameters:
target - the String being looked for
Returns:
an array of the matched Movies

searchByActor

public Movie[] searchByActor(java.lang.String target)
This method searches through the movie list by Actor attribute and returns all matches to a given target String. Partial matches are found.

Parameters:
target - the String being looked for
Returns:
an array of the matched Movies
